name: nearby_google
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nearby_places.
Tool description: Get nearby establishments.
API description: Returns a **JSON array of nearby places** sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Only values from **/types (Google)** are valid types.

Maximum places returned per request is 20.

lat.description: Latitude of the location to search nearby places.

lng.description: Longitude of the location to search nearby places.

type.description: Type of place to search for. Default is 'cafe'. Only values from Google's /types are valid.

radius.description: Search radius in meters. Default is 200. Maximum allowed is 50000.
